definition: the warhead of a missile designed to deliver an atom bomb, cook or heat in a microwave oven
details:
noun
- the warhead of a missile designed to deliver an atom bomb
= synonyms: atomic warhead
verb
- cook or heat in a microwave oven
= synonyms: microwave, zap, micro-cook
- bomb with atomic weapons
- strike at with firepower or bombs
= synonyms: zap, atomize, atomise
